document_data.name: Baric Nylef
document_data.mainbody: '''Baric Nylef''' was a knight of [[Tyr]] that lived in [[Bryn Shander]] some time after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
Baric was a member of the [[Order of the Gauntlet]].

In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Baric went to Bryn Shander to capture the notorious criminal [[Worvil Forkbeard]], rumored to have hidden in the [[Ten Towns]]. He posed as a unemployed caravan guard drinking at the [[Kelvin's Comfort]] tavern. Baric was at the tavern when [[giant]]s attacked the city.
document_data.Personality: Baric was a true devotee of Tyr. He waited for the day when he would meet his god. In the meantime, he felt that he must clean the world from evil.
